name: dat-polyfill
description: Add support for the DatArchive API to the web

scripts.build-demo: browserify --debug -r fs:graceful-fs -s DemoServer -e ./demo/server/index.js > ./demo/server/bundle.js && browserify --debug -r fs:graceful-fs -s DatPolyfill -e ./polyfill.js > ./demo/client/bundle.js
scripts.watch-demo: watchify -v --debug -r fs:graceful-fs -s DatPolyfill -e ./polyfill.js -o ./demo/client/bundle.js | watchify -v --debug -r fs:graceful-fs -s DemoServer -e ./demo/server/index.js -o ./demo/server/bundle.js

author: rangermauve
